<title level="1" pfs="">[Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3551)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Guards are rank-and-file members of a town watch or city guard, trained to look for trouble, take down criminals, and follow orders.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Guard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3551)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 110

**Perception** +7; (8 to find concealed objects) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +5, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), [Signal Whistle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=50)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20

</row>

**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +6 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Raise The Alarm!</title>

In a settlement with an alarm, brawls, or other major disruptions trigger an alarm 1 round after the watch is alerted. Guards start to arrive after about 5 rounds, usually in patrols of 2 or 3 members, with larger groups of 8–12 near important locations.
</aside>
